articles.title: Several factors are converging to push gas prices higher - The Associated Press
articles.description: DALLAS (AP) — There is little evidence that gasoline prices, which hit a record $5 a gallon on Saturday, will drop anytime soon. Rising prices at the pump are a key driver in the highest inflation that Americans have seen  in 40 years.
